title: "NYC Restaurant Inspections Dashboard"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r}
# Install p8105.datasets package
#install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("p8105/p8105.datasets")

# Load necessary libraries
library(flexdashboard)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)

# Load the rest_inspec dataset from the package
data(rest_inspec)
nyc_restaurants <- rest_inspec

# Filter and sample the dataset
nyc_restaurants <- 
  nyc_restaurants %>%
  filter(!is.na(score)) %>%
  sample_n(1000)  # Sample to reduce dataset size for spee
```
